about.me: TRUST is the official pool of STORI.digital. Our future mission is to migrate STORi Platform to the Cardano blockchain.

about.company: STORi is an AI-backed partnerships discovery tool. STORi helps build strategic partnerships across all platforms with the world's top storytellers. We go beyond product placement.
